description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Take this Udemy Marketing Course and be on the fast track to more Udemy revenue each month!

Updated on 11/1/2015: Now includes updated Course Marketing Checklist! Print Checklist to PDF, Download to Excel, sort list and more!

Plus new site to market your Udemy course!

Did you know that there's more places than just Facebook groups to market your Udemy course? I have compiled a list of 50+ places and ways for you to market your own Udemy course and earn more revenue.

OVER 2,341 STUDENTS CURRENTLY ENROLLED! SEE WHAT STUDENTS ARE SAYING BELOW.

Latest Course Reviews for Udemy Marketing: Earn More Marketing Your Course:

Leaped forward this week in traffic and search engine position

Dennis

Thanks for the 30 minute discussion this week. Several things happened after our discussion.

First was that my additional marketing that you had suggested, generated another 120 students.

The second was that you had suggested that by generating more discussion interaction that might help my Udemy search engine position. It did. I made the coaching offer to my students which generated more discussions. I noticed that just as the number of discussions I had went one more than the #1 position for my keywords, that I suddenly went from my old position #5 to position #1. At least I believe that's what it was. At the same time I was getting more students, but I believe it was the number of discussions. So I'm going to kick that up even further.

The Best Course On Promoting Your Udemy Course

Thank you for bringing all of this valuable information together. Now it is so much easier to promote my courses. Dennis has created a well-organized and structured course - I highly recommend it.

Excellent course!!

This course is perfect for anyone that is an instructor on Udemy! I've taken a few of Dennis' courses and they are all excellent, and this one is just fantastic! If you are considering becoming an instructor on Udemy, this is a must have resource!

I made money from this course

Dennis has really helped me in marketing my first course here on Udemy. My course is now on the front page of the personal development, personal transformation section and is the highest selling course for goal setting on Udemy. I couldn't have done it without Dennis and his marketing strategies. He has gone out of his way for me and his awareness of where to post coupons has made me money! This is a great course for those looking to market their courses and earn even more money. A++

Thanks a lot Dennis for creating this course

As a new online instructor I didn't know how I could promote my courses online. Thanks to you I have created a check-list with all the places where I can promote my courses!

Click On "Take This Course" and start earning more revenue now with these proven marketing techniques. Don't wait another minute, start maximizing your Udemy profits now by adding course coupons to the sites shown in this course!

Maximize Your Udemy Earnings With Information Taught In This Course!

  • Top Udemy Marketing Course on Udemy!
  • Udemy Marketing Tips
  • Discover over 45+ Udemy course deal coupon sites that you can promote your course with!
  • Most of these places are free to post your Udemy course coupon. Little or no out of pocket!
  • 50+ lectures packed full of useful tips and advice.
  • Sell more courses. Earn more income!
  • Improve your SEO (Search Engine Optimization). Better your chances of someone finding your course via a Google search.
  • Access to Google+ Hangouts with top Udemy instructors.

By promoting your Udemy course on the coupon deal sites listed in this course you will increase your course income. I can't promise overnight success but I know that potential students are browsing these sites looking for deals on Udemy courses.

This is a course designed to help Udemy instructors with the marketing of their courses. I will show you how to place your course on each discount website and show you other ideas for marketing your course online and even offline.

30-Day Money Back 100% Risk Free Offer!

COURSE BONUS: Access Google+ Hangouts with top Udemy instructors that are packed with useful advice and information on their Udemy journey. We all started at zero and most weren't an overnight success.

Here is some of what you will learn during this course:

  • Top 5 Places to add your Udemy course coupon. Start with these first!
  • Why you should have a WordPress website. It's more affordable than you think!
  • How you can edit your Facebook post so it stands out.
  • Why you should consider having a Podcast or be a guest on a Podcast show.
  • Udemy Course Cross Promotions work!
  • Udemy Course Marketing advice.
  • Why you should consider Kindle books to market your course.

Don't forget to check out the free preview lectures to sample my course. Are you ready to learn?

Join over 14,929 students in 144 countries around the world taking my courses on Udemy!

Click On "Take This Course" and start earning more revenue now with these proven marketing techniques. Don't wait another minute, start maximizing your Udemy profits now by adding course coupons to the sites shown in this course!
title: Udemy Marketing: Where to Promote Course Coupons - Unofficial
